githubRepository.name: io.noisyfox.oplongshotxposed
githubRepository.readme:
# OPLongshotXposed
A Xposed module for OPLongshot, forces saving screenshot in PNG format.

将一加氧OS截图格式改回PNG。
githubRepository.readmeHTML:
OPLongshotXposed

A Xposed module for OPLongshot, forces saving screenshot in PNG format.

将一加氧OS截图格式改回PNG。

A Xposed module for OPLongshot on OxygenOS, forces saving screenshot in PNG format.
将一加氧OS截图格式改回PNG。
